00010 #define NSDateIsEarlierThan NSOrderedAscending
00011 
00018 #define NSDateIsLaterThan NSOrderedDescending
00019 
00020 /*
00021  NSDate's instance methods such as -laterDate: may not give the
00022  sensible result when one of the dates is nil.  These class methods
00023  give sensible results in all cases. 
00024  */
00025 @interface NSDate (SafeCompare)
00026 
00027 + (NSDate*)laterDate:(NSDate*)date1
00028                                 date:(NSDate*)date2 ;
00029 
00030 @end
